analysis.description:
Game.bet (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#175-211) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(oddOrEven == ODD || oddOrEven == EVEN)
	- require(bool)(oddOrEven == ODD || oddOrEven == EVEN)
	- oddOrEven == ODD

Game.bet (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#175-211) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(oddOrEven == ODD || oddOrEven == EVEN)
	- require(bool)(oddOrEven == ODD || oddOrEven == EVEN)
	- oddOrEven == ODD
Game.getBlockHashOddOrEven (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#237-253) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _oddOrEven == 1
	- _oddOrEven == 0

Reentrancy in Game.withdrawRevenue (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#279-319):
	External calls:
	- IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(msg.sender,participants[msg.sender].bets[_blockNumber].ODDBets) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#288-289)
	- IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(msg.sender,participants[msg.sender].bets[_blockNumber].EVENBets) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#289-292)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#293-295)

Reentrancy in Game.withdrawRevenue (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#279-319):
	External calls:
	- IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(msg.sender,totalPayment) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#310-313)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#313-315)
newParticipant in Game.bet (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#186-189) is a local variable never initialiazed

Game.calculateRevenue (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#260-274) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(ownerWallet,comission) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#267-268)

Game.withdrawRevenue (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#279-319) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(msg.sender,participants[msg.sender].bets[_blockNumber].ODDBets) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#288-289)
	-IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(msg.sender,participants[msg.sender].bets[_blockNumber].EVENBets) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#289-292)
	-IMoneyManager(moneyManager).payTo(msg.sender,totalPayment) (/unique_contracts/0xb8c5952d4ec0407f0edf23480655bca641480623.sol#310-313)

	External calls:
